parameter.name: multiline
parameter.help: If true, the lines of text are wrapped to fit within the text width. (The name multiline is a misnomer. Unwrapped text can be multiple lines if it contains a br or p element, or a line break within a pre element.

parameter.name: resize
parameter.help: text width automatically resizes when text is set. default: false

parameter.name: selectable
parameter.help: true if text may be selected by the user
